title: Video Generation using Wan Task
name: video-generation-wan-task
setup: uv pip install transformerlab diffusers ftfy huggingface-hub opencv-python && uv pip install torch torchvision --index-url https://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu126
description: Video generation task using Wan2.1 models. Requires a Hugging Face token in HF_TOKEN env var for model access.
